backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing user profiles, agent registry with pre-populated agents (Skippy, GLaDOS, Robby, etc.), debate state management, file metadata storage, and access control using mixins for authorization and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including React components, hooks, configuration, and utilities for a debate/agent management system with speech recognition and Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/.env: Local development environment configuration specifying backend canister ID and DFX network set to 'local'.
frontend/.env.production: Production environment configuration with backend canister ID and DFX network set to 'ic' for Internet Computer mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes using a neutral grayscale palette suitable for technical infrastructure UI.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the application titled 'The Gang' with a root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component with three tabs (Boardroom, Sensory Cortex, Swarm Health), Internet Identity authentication, debate management with voice/text input, transcript download, and agent registry display.
frontend/src/components/AgentRegistryTab: Agent registry table displaying system infrastructure vitals with toggle switches for agent status, memory usage progress bars, diagnostics modal, and a reset agents button.
frontend/src/components/CrashLogModal.ts: Dialog modal component displaying agent diagnostics and telemetry information with monospace terminal-style formatting in green/black theme.
frontend/src/components/DebateDisplay.ts: Displays the boardroom debate transcript with speaker badges, text-to-speech controls, and emergency mode indicator. Auto-scrolls to show new messages and parses transcript lines by speaker (Skippy, GLaDOS, Robby, SYSTEM, User).
Provides a button to interrupt/stop an active debate by canceling speech synthesis and calling the backend abort mutation.
frontend/src/components/PushToTalkButton: Implements push-to-talk speech recognition with visual feedback, processing transcripts when recording stops and preventing duplicate submissions via ref tracking.
frontend/src/components/SensoryCortexTab: Handles file uploads (drag-drop, manual, camera) with chunked processing for large files, routing documents to appropriate agents based on content type and generating previews for text/image files.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality, identity persistence, and status tracking through React context and AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including debate management (start, abort, clear, status), document routing, and agent registry management (get statuses, toggle, reset).
React hook wrapping the Web Speech Recognition API to provide voice-to-text transcription with start/stop controls, error handling, and browser support detection.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechSynthesis.ts: React hook wrapping the Web Speech Synthesis API to convert text to speech with British male voice preference and speaking state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeWordStub.ts: Commented-out stub for future Picovoice Porcupine wake word detection integration to trigger speech recognition automatically.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme colors using OKLCH color space, including design tokens for UI components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that sets up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/transcriptParser.ts: Utility function that sanitizes AI response text by stripping HTML table tags and converting URLs and markdown links to clickable anchor elements.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from query strings or hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence for maintaining state like admin tokens across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH, container settings, border radius variables, animations, and typography/container-queries plugins.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite build configuration for React with environment variable injection for canister IDs, path aliases, and local development proxy to IC replica on port 4943.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document describing the 10-canister multi-agent AI system architecture, cycle management strategy (Option 2: Agents Self-Sustaining), known issues, and pending feature requests including Deep Thought accountant canister implementation.
